title: Is “Chatbot with AI” a good topic for thesis or should I switch to something else? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on what you want to do with AI chatbot. You don’t indicate your major so there are potentially some totally different topics. Just to name a few, History of technology: The advance of AI chatbot and its futureProgramming: Creating an AI chatbot from scratch using PythonSoftware engineering: Creating an AI chatbot using open source softwareNLP (undergraduate): Machine learning based AI chatbotNLP (postgraduate): A new approach to machine learning based AI chatbotNLP (PhD candidate): Self-learning conversational AI (if you haven’t heard of that, check http://acobot.ai/demo)Technology ethics (PhD candidate): Chatbot psychologics and ethics…I cannot say they’re good or bad. They are all interesting in my eyes. Final tip: double the time you plan if you want to implement an AI chatbot software, which is more challenging than the most people assume.

Undergraduate level (or below): yes if you would enjoy the project. Postgrad: Take care as simple pattern matching Chatbot would not be high enough level. A real Chatbot that used NLP to ‘understand’ the user would be a real challenge. IMHO it might be the greatest challenge facing A.I. right now.
